entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Vineland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:22 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Vineland Station 12:00 AM EST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: 6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.5 kPa rising
Humidity: 73 %
Dewpoint: 2.0°C
Wind: SW 36 km/h gust 57 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: A few showers. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 7:03 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 5. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 7:03 PM EST Thursday 09 February 2023
